Experimental SPA login

The goal here is to make all browsers prompt to save the credentials. Or at least as many as possible.
This is done using a button onclick, which triggers an AJAX auth request. If the request succeeds, the form is submitted by javascript.
It redirects away after a successful auth. There was not other way I could make chrome prompt to save the password
Valid emails are a@b.com and c@d.com, valid passwords are 1234 and 12345 (you can mix them however you like)
